instructions.description:
You need an emergency trip permit from the New Jersey Division of Alcoholic Beverage Control (ABC) if your business: 
 - picks up or delivers alcoholic beverages into, out of, or within New Jersey
 - does not have an `annual transportation license or permit|transportation-license-permit`
instructions.applicationInstructionsDescription: Apply for a permit for each pickup or delivery you make in New Jersey. The permit is valid for 24 hours from the date you choose or for a single trip.
instructions.applicationDetails: This application takes 5-10 minutes to complete. The fee is $25.00 per permit plus a $5.00 online service fee. After you submit your payment, you will get a confirmation email with the permit download link.
instructions.helpText: Need help? Click the help button at the bottom of the screen to chat with us, Monday through Friday, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. Eastern Time. Need after hours help? Learn more about [support services from the Division of Alcoholic Beverage Control.](https://www.njoag.gov/about/divisions-and-offices/division-of-alcoholic-beverage-control-home/emergency-trip-permit/)

requestor.requestorSectionSubHeading: Enter the following information for your business or a contracted driver or trucking company.

billing.permitSubheader: A confirmation email with a link to download your permit will be sent to ${requestorEmail}. You may have the permit sent other ways. Please select all options you prefer.
billing.pdfAttachCheckboxLabel: Attach the permit document to my confirmation email
billing.textMessageDownloadLinkCheckboxLabel: Send the permit download link via text message
billing.additionalEmailDownloadLinkCheckboxLabel: Send the permit download link to another email address
billing.tripPermitFeeInfo: This is the cost of an emergency trip permit for a single trip

review.infoAlertText: Review your information below before paying. Once you click "Pay Now" you will be directed to a secure payment platform operated by New Jersey's partner, NICUSA Inc.
review.errorSubmitText: Check the steps below for missing information or errors:
review.apiErrorText: Something went wrong. Review your information and try again later.
review.alternateEmail: Send Permit Link to Alternative Email:

abcEmergencyTripPermit.taskName: Apply for Your Emergency Trip Permit for Last-Minute Alcohol Pickups or Deliveries
